name: Survive the West
description: You are spawning in a western open world, full of loot areas and points to build up your new home, be aware of raiders. You can play alone or with your friends in the World, you need to eat, drink, hunt, collect resources and you need weapons to protect yourself and your friends, you can take the Train to travel around the world, while you are exploring the big world you could find interesting and dangerous areas in the World of “Survive the West”, be careful when you are searching lost treasures.
